description:
This course is a quick step by step instructional guide to using Sigil and iBooks Author in order to produce ebooks in both the ePub format as well as the popular iBooks format.

Sigil can be downloaded at https://code.google.com/p/sigil/

The details of iBooks Author can be found at http://www.apple.com/ibooks-author/

This course is meant to be a quick start guide to creating eBooks with these two software. You will quickly learn how to create different chapters in your eBook, generate Table of Contents, insert Text and Images and later on Video and Audio. Also covered are how to create a Cover Page and adding both Internal and External Hyperlinks to your eBook.

Note that I am not covering the publishing aspects of eBooks. But perhaps this topic can be added in the future.
title: Create That EBook
